about_the_game:
"Hello David, do you want to play some more?" Revisit the horrors of both Don't Be Afraid games through their terrifying soundscapes blended into one, twisted compilation.

About This Content

Music of Don’t Be Afraid is not a soundtrack, but rather a compilation of essential original pieces from both games. Face the shadows once again. This time you won’t need a flashlight, as the paranoia will seep only through your ear canals. Slowly, drip by drip…

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 3 GB available space
